topic.title: 不要在这里发中文贴（Don't post Chinese here）
topic.body: 顶部有专门的中文论坛链接 http://127.0.0.1:43110/NewGFWTalk.bit ，而且不只是中文，其他语言也有各自的论坛。请到中文论坛发帖。

topic.title: China is massivly blocking VPNs
topic.body: It is very likely that people in China can only visit websites permitted by the govenment in the near future. At that time, 0net would be a popular platform where people can talk freely.

1_1Hv2qHowmG8sURX51L4zXQDDxakF6XgEvB.body: Yes. People cannot feel any presence of internet, and guess what, they don't care.

2_18WuQsUbszu95sZDiKvrfswRnEpuB5WEQh.body: 0net is much more robust than twister.

1509046035_1CmstATrVYNZWP2aD4rgGiJpeJFcp.body: 现有的分类是没有问题的，没有必要更改规则。

1509180149_12a6CEoGaQn9rHsDaYDwRxfZbAXiM.body: Sorry non-english posts are all taken as Chinese...

1510016652_18hzaqoC9z5y4XYBnTU4inB6EWmBH.body: 入门的书都差不多，最受欢迎的拿来看看就行。编程是一门技能而不是一门学科，看书只占 20%，练习至少要占 80%。

1509114817_13Eyd2mLy8BPT1g3kTASv4UPWhgz7.body: 这里只是临时板块，楼主应该点击页面顶部的“中文论坛”，去相应板块发帖。
